title: CLEO Task Registry Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating TASKS.json - the stable task ID registry for the CLEO (Claude Lifecycle Execution Orchestrator) system. Enforces stable T### task IDs that never change once assigned.

version.description: Semantic version of the task registry format (e.g., '1.0.0')

project.description: Project name this task registry belongs to

lastTaskId.description: Highest assigned task ID number (used for generating next ID)

tasks.description: Array of all tasks with stable IDs

taskId.description: Stable task ID in CLEO format: T followed by 3 digits (e.g., T001, T042)

id.description: Unique stable task identifier. Once assigned, this ID never changes.

title.description: Short descriptive title of the task

phase.description: Phase number this task belongs to (1-indexed)

assignee.description: Agent type assigned to this task (e.g., 'backend-architect', 'database-engineer')

leverage.description: Leverage score (0-10) indicating task priority based on dependency impact

dependencies.description: Array of task IDs that must be completed before this task can start

created.description: ISO 8601 datetime when this task was created

completed.description: ISO 8601 datetime when this task was completed (only set when status is 'completed')

blockedBy.description: Reason the task is blocked (only set when status is 'blocked')
